dict.string: Deejiar uses your location to help you discover nearby cafés, shops, and cultural landmarks — and guide you to each one. Location is only used while you’re exploring, and never stored.

Deejiar uses your device identifier to measure installs and subscriptions performance. We do not sell your data, and tracking is only used to improve your app experience.
